name: Josh Smith
title: Lead Software Developer
description: I am developer based out of the Salt Lake City Area. I mainly focus my work around web based projects. I am a caffeine lover and I love to play video games. Aside from the fun, I am a hard worker and very Communicative.

skills.description: JavaScript has been a big part of my career. I am familiar with React and Angular frameworks and also do backend work in Node.JS. I have built full scale web application's using it and love to build and create with it.

I have used Python for many ETL applications and moving big data. I have analysed and measured productivity and performance using Python. I have also built frontend applications running on Flask and have used many libraries such as Pandas, Tensorflow and PyODBC.

I have done a lot of projects on the Frontend. A have used many technologies like: React, Angular, Bootstrap, Firebase, SCSS, HTML5, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, Wordpress, Wordpress Custom Plugins, Shopify, Bluestep, and more!

I have built many applications and backend API's with Node.JS and Flask. I have also integrated with other API's and am familiar with Google API's, AWS, Azure, and SQL Databases. I have also created workflows and ran projects in a DevOps framework and have used many project management tools like Jira, Azure DevOps, and GitHub.

I have built out two full scale mobile application's for clients. I have used Android Studio and XCode to build out applications. I have also used React Native to go as in between for the two platforms. I highly recommend using React Native to speed up development times and increase quality with the made up time.
